CmdLine: apt-get update     && apt-get install -y --no-install-recommends          gcc          vim          wget          python3          python3-all-dev          nginx          sqlite3     && apt-get upgrade -y     && wget -c -O get-pip.py --no-check-certificate https://bootstrap.pypa.io/get-pip.py     && python3 get-pip.py     && pip3 -V     && apt-get autoclean     && apt-get autoremove     && rm -rf get-pip.py     && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*
